testcase.name: runScenario
testcase.system-out: @event Scenario: Adding an event with an invalid past date # features/Events.feature:10 When the admin enters the invalid event details, Date as "01/01/2001", Title as "New Year Party", Description as "Celebrate the New Year", Location as "Main Auditorium", and Presenter as "CEO" # stepdefinition.tc8_adding_invalid_event.the_admin_enters_the_invalid_event_details_Date_as_Title_as_Description_as_Location_as_and_Presenter_as(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And click the add button for invalid case # stepdefinition.tc8_adding_invalid_event.click_the_add_button_for_invalid_case() Taking Screenshot Then the system should display and error message Event date must be today or a future date # stepdefinition.tc8_adding_invalid_event.the_system_should_display_and_error_message_Event_date_must_be_today_or_a_future_date() java.lang.AssertionError: expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:97) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:969) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:43) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:53) at stepdefinition.tc8_adding_invalid_event.the_system_should_display_and_error_message_Event_date_must_be_today_or_a_future_date(tc8_adding_invalid_event.java:54) at ✽.the system should display and error message Event date must be today or a future date(file:///C:/Users/Administrator/Documents/Selenium%20demo/codecharge_community_portal_capstone/features/Events.feature:13)
